mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (openId, nickName, avatarUrl, gender, city, province, country, language, coinNum, buyTemplateId, likeId, createtime, modifytime, status) values (#{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coinnum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buytemplateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{likeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set openId = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatarUrl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coinNum = #{coinnum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, buyTemplateId = #{buytemplateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, likeId = #{likeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, openId, nickName, avatarUrl, gender, city, province, country, language, coinNum, buyTemplateId, likeId, createtime, modifytime, status from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
